    • Field Detail

      • level

        public final TTechLevel level
        To level

      • timeBefore

        public final float timeBefore
        Time for start tech up from the time when this trigger was created. If = 0 then need do now.

      • timeForBuildLevel

        public final float timeForBuildLevel
        Time for build this level

      • onBase

        public TBase onBase
        Do tech up on this base

      • triggerRes

        public final float[] triggerRes
        Trigger resource. resource[i] = current[i] + timeForBuildLevel*income[i]. Current resource must be more or equals that this value.
